output: Kai, you don't know, do you?
Followed Xiao Hong and the others quietly here.
Xiao Hong
Exactly so.
You are unaware of this matter.

Regarding last time, they weren't having a birthday, but you brought something, and I brought K. Then they got to know each other, they recognized each other, and they had a meal together alone—I’m not sure how they ended up together.
Indeed.

I don't know about this matter of mine, nor do I recall you sending me a photo on the day K Daddy—I looked at it and thought it was a marriage certificate.

I really started to believe I was married, but then upon closer inspection, I realized it was real people—they had genuinely registered their marriage, and he had taken a liking to her.
That’s not a bad conditional price for what you brought. It's also quite agreeable to see two people getting along and having a good rapport.
Regarding this part, don't place too much emphasis on what I'm telling you—it's genuinely a good fit. Please examine it carefully.
It's not quite a perfect match, but actually, it’s quite suitable. Let’s just wish them both well.
I haven’t contacted her in a long time. How has she been lately?
They registered their marriage.
Impossible, how could we possibly? How could they be ten years apart? How could they be together?
Oh, that day.
They began to talk.
I am utterly flabbergasted; who is pursuing whom here?
The age difference is attributable to circumstances within his parents’ family.
Oh dear, really? Love knows no age.
What are they suitable for? Their personalities don't even match.
Blessings to you.
They, well, I’m a little embarrassed to say. Let's have them meet separately now.
You don’t know, do you?
Departed quietly.

When he got married, we quietly did so, and whether we knew it or not, it was quiet on our end, or perhaps I quietly knew it. That person is now distant from me, and I still hear about it from others.

How would I know? Perhaps at that moment, KT liked the adjusted price, thought the adjustment was good, but then realized after half a day that the personalities weren’t compatible, the temperaments didn’t match—it should be that.
I do not know either.
It's not primarily this, but rather like this—at that time, didn’t you say you felt they weren’t a good match? I also thought they were quite a good match. Now, as you predicted, they weren’t.
I thought you were trying to arrange things, weren’t you?
I believe you arranged it, truly believing it wasn't your concern. But they already knew each other then, they were together at the time.
Oh, I see. Then let's not eat with others; let's arrange something separately. Let's see and inquire about the situation.

Let's not talk about it.
Let's not talk about it.
Consider this: over the next couple of days, perhaps we could arrange for them—that couple—to join us for a meal.
It's not that you and he, or she, don’t have quite good relationships. You give me a call, and I’ll arrange for me to treat you tomorrow.
What is the matter?
What are you leaving?
It's not that—how long has it only been since they got married?
It's not about whether your marriage is quickly nearing divorce; what's the reason for that?
That was when our eyes didn't meet, when what marriage could possibly have been pursued then?
There must be a reason for this.
You see, I thought the age difference between them was right here, they definitely wouldn't work out. But I really didn’t expect him to be only a little over a month old.
I was wrong, I was wrong. What was that for? He was the wrong age; they were married despite a difference of more than ten years and divorced within a little over a month.
Knowing at the time that you and he had a good relationship, haven't I been doing everything for you?
A solitary gamble yields no hopeful prospects.
It wasn't me, Xiaohong, I didn't say to choose a place near the subway. This one is three kilometers from the subway—it's inconvenient for my commute.
It’s not about you; it’s about Chaoyang. You see how large other people’s windows are. Look, your window is so small; I'll just put in an eye so I can watch the sunrise in Chaoyang.
Isn't this a hard requirement? I was hoping to find a better place; it’s likely just idle talk or nonsense. And regarding the five flavors, couldn't you look for other properties for me?
Oh dear, look at you. In this manner, your words are incorrect. I paid to find you to help me. Are you comparing drinking with me?

It’s not that I’m certain I can afford a good place, but you should just find me one. There are so many options around, and you insist on this particular development. Are you saying you have such limited capacity? Just find me a house.
It's not that you can't smell it, that such a strong odor of mildew permeates everything to this extent. How can I possibly enter without getting sick? If I do get sick, who will take responsibility?
Let’s sign a contract. I’ll cover the medical expenses for your treatment, and you’ll handle the spending.
Alright, alright, I see your abilities are just like this, so be it. Truly.
This room is the one that just became available here.

It's not it primarily; it's that housing is particularly tight right now, and this room is also quite good.
Look at this environment; it’s very pleasant. And this window faces the sun – does this meet your requirements?
A window is all that's needed; you live alone, after all, it's not like that.
This room, adjacent to the washroom, has a dressing gown, a striking outfit, and a refrigerator, with the refrigerator door open.
I’m telling you honestly, if I introduced just these few clients for you each month, I would be annoyed myself, you know?
I'm offering you a good deal; I've found something affordable for you. You said it was difficult. Now you say this isn't right and that isn't right – you’re just finding fault.
If you speak like that, having this house—being able to live in it—is already quite fortunate.

However, look at what I found for you – a place near the subway, a place near the subway. You say the fees are high, and it’s not suitable for you. Let me find you something a bit further away. You have time anyway. How about this apartment with tile floors? Let me explain it clearly.

Don’t go repeating what I tell you, you see, this is because it was freshly scraped from a white area and hasn't yet developed its flavor. You say my waist is simply too high. You say I’ve already made it through this month, and I won’t be renting [it] anymore.
Ye Er Xiaogang has arrived; he’s come to see how things are.
Oh, is that not possible?
You tend to arrive at Chaoyang quite late.
It wasn't as if we weren't having a perfectly good conversation online just now. You said to come and rent, and now you're finding fault with things here.
Good morning.

You can rent it from me later; I’ll have it cleaned for you in advance.
First, see if this floor plan suits you.
You talk so much, it’s truly something.

It’s not that I, the person in charge, designed the room like that for that guest. If you can't do it, I’ll have it repainted; if you want white, I’ll paint it white, if you want black, I'll paint it black.
How wonderful! Ten years without a visit—look at this sign.
Xiao Gang, I’ve noticed you always find fault. Let’s just talk online, say things online; it’s not my responsibility anymore.
Very good.

These are all heirlooms from my family's elder aunt. You're belittling my family's elder uncle? You mustn't change anything; you've already agreed. If you're coming to stay, you must use the things in my home.
Then, with this faucet flowing like this, you should really try it yourself.

Let me put it this way. This entire building is now mine. You see this key I have? I have the key. However, this price only applies to this one set. It’s up to you whether you want to do it or not. If not, forget about it.
Nan Nan, please leave quickly. This is what is being said.
It’s not about whether it’s old; it’s this house.
I said to the landlady, “You see, you see this window.”
The head overhang is too small. As a man, I have certain preferences, and this all-around ventilation is also unsatisfactory.
Alright, and if you insist, look at the ground.
And this—you see this point—this, this—has no one ever lived here? A gust of air entered this room, a rolling one. It’s a smell I can’t quite describe.

It's not that I'm speaking, but my initial impression is that he’s not good. You look over here and see white, you look over there and see black. You mention when you scrape the whitewash. You know it will be slightly cloudy when you scrape.
I didn't mention my eldest sister, but you've had this refrigerator for ten years, haven't you?
Although it's a well-known brand, look at the scent inside—it’s simply not suitable for this purpose.
This isn’t because I ate too much; look at the washing machine, look.
He inquired as to the proper method of using this.

Picking up and adding things, I said, “Putting these away is useless.”
Otherwise, just staring at these things.
My knowledge is useless; let's take a bath. Is there somewhere to quickly bathe?

You, my water-soluble self, cannot continue to flow and wash, let me see the fish head.
This bathtub exists, it lacks taro.
I said I know, older sister, please find me a place where the expenses are roughly similar, and I can manage the environment myself—at least ensuring good air quality and a pleasant environment.
Go, go, go. Not me. I will not rent. I will not rent.
What’s wrong with thirty? Isn’t thirty an age to have a relationship? Isn’t it you, Dad, who keeps saying I’m too old? Then what’s wrong with being single at thirty? It’s fine, isn’t it?
It’s not that I don’t blame you; you bite me, but you are not yourself. You are not yourself, so don't raise me.

Your age has nothing to do with me. You’re shaking me, isn’t it because you want to? I’m over thirty and I’m doing quite well on my own. You say I should find someone who loves me, but what if I find a partner who doesn’t love me? Will you be responsible for that? Will you find someone for me?
It’s not that I like them and they don’t like me; I’m not saying I haven’t liked others whom they didn't find worthy of their attention.

I simply don't want to pursue a romantic relationship; I’ll cultivate cotton instead.
One can still earn money from cotton, you know.
Are you alright? My current salary is enough to compete with yours. Wouldn't it be good if the two of us women worked together? It’s perfectly fine to do so together.

Just say you said I need to find a partner. If we can’t live together, we can’t live together. Then how am I supposed to grow old with you? Things are fine like this now, aren't they? But I need to figure things out, right?

I am not angry; you are the one who is angry, or you feel that you are the one who is angry.
When have I ever been angry? It truly isn't possible.

You say you're in your early thirties.
I just want to ask you when you'll be ready to start dating.
You are doing well on your own. So many years. After your mother passed, I was alone. I managed everything, your eating, drinking, eliminating waste – I raised you entirely on my own.
I only hope, my daughter, I only hope you can find a man who loves you and whom you love. Your father begs you, please, can you find a partner?
I have grown older.
Wouldn't you find one you like?
Don't lecture me with all that nonsense. You just don’t want to be in a relationship. Then instead of a relationship, you’ll be discussing cotton.
In your early thirties. If our daughter doesn't start dating soon, do you expect to be supported by your father for the rest of your life?

I truly tell you,
Having a daughter like you, she could genuinely exhaust my life.
Alright, I’ll give you a deadline. This year, you must bring a son-in-law home for me to see.
Dad, you were looking at my phone.
I don't care about this father. I said before about my phone; you must stop looking at it. How old am I? I'm almost an adult; I'm not a child anymore.

My mind is still on not letting my studies slip. I’m currently in the top ten of the entire grade. I haven't let you down, have I? 

You don't need to inquire about what I'm doing right now.

No, no, no, it’s nothing. 

Right now, I just need to focus on studying well for you.

What I do, I feel you have no right to interfere with, but I proceed regardless. If you continue like this, there’s nothing further to discuss, and you shouldn’t even look at my phone again. I will not allow you to discover any conversations on my phone.
I do not betray you, nor do I fear you first.
I'm not angry with you; it’s your own feeling.
On what grounds is confiscation permitted?

It wasn't when you gave me this phone that you said I would manage it myself and use it myself. Now you're taking it back. When I was at school, who would I contact? If I got home, I wouldn't be able to contact anyone, and I’d just be lost.
I never rushed into a relationship, when did I ever seem to have rushed into one? You just look at those two characters, and you think I rushed into one.
What’s wrong with being sixteen? I’m quite grown up.
Did I say I was in a relationship? I haven't been handsome while in a relationship, have I? You're the one who thinks I'm in a relationship.
It is not that we, the younger generation, speak this way now. If you are not adaptable, then do not expect us to speak differently for your sake.
What do you mean, if you're so capable, go ahead and challenge me?

Explain this to me.

Who is this boy in the mobile chat?
I am your father; may I not look? Are you seeing someone romantically?
You are eighteen years old, an adult. Let me tell you, in our rural area, if you are a boy, your parents can still manage if you start dating.

Do not forget that you are a girl.
Do you understand? You are a girl. You’ve started high school so early.
My daughter is in high school. You are not focusing your attention on your studies.
Put your hand to your heart, and be honest.
This is purely to provoke me, isn't it?
I told you to feel this way, and from today, your phone is confiscated.
On what grounds, on what grounds, do I claim to be your father?
It’s early romance, understand? It’s early romance; your focus isn’t on your studies.
My sixteen-year-old daughter, you are only sixteen.
Let's start a romantic relationship now.

The chat log is so pitifully worded.

Where are you all? You act like elementary school students.

Where did you learn this behavior at such a young age?
Say that again and I'll slap you.

I have nothing more to say to you. 
Let’s talk about it after your mother returns.
What does "爸" mean? Please explain it; I know everything else.
Auntie Xiaohong, the auntie I called, similar to me, but you are the auntie I am told to call, a subordinate.

Okay, you don’t need to mention Xiaohong to me. Auntie, simply calling Xiaohong will suffice. Thank you, Dad. 

I simply cannot bear it.
When did you say we’re getting married? Dad, if you’re going to say you're dating, I’ve always just turned a blind eye and moved on. But you're bringing up marriage—what do you mean?
That was a relationship I had with you.
I, too, have not received a phone call from Xiaohong; we haven’t been in contact at all. Then you should summon Xiaohong over.
Stop it. You're married to him. Aunt Xiaohong has become Mother. Shall I call you Mother?
Do you think that’s acceptable? Can you endure it yourself? I am the same age as Xiaohong, and I call her “mother”—aren’t you distressed by that?

What’s wrong, Xiaohong? No, no, no, don’t let me call Mom, please don’t let me call Mom like this. I won't say anything about you dating him, but there’s absolutely no way I’m allowing you to marry him.
Do you know why it’s impossible? If he wants to marry you, he’ll separate assets from me.

I am the only child now.
You need to add his name to the household registration at home.
I’m telling you, I'm severing all ties with you as my father, I'm telling you.
Let him enter our house, and I will absolutely cut off all ties with you. I’m not lying.

Just don’t let Little Hong’s mother, or Auntie Hong, get involved at all. 
I’m telling you, just let him leave. 
You just need to make sure I don’t find out, or see anything.
It’s not your Uncle Ha, but this time for your Aunt Xiaohong, it's been over a year, even including the water.
You know, like you know me and Aunt Xiaohong, what relationship we have.
It's not that you disagree with our marriage, is it?
I’ve raised you, my daughter, in vain, Father, you’ve worked so hard. After your mother and I were separated these many years, has she ever called you?
Have I ever cared for you? Have I ever bought you things? It has all been your father, me.

I and Xiaohong are about to get married.
I want to discuss this with you. As long as you agree, Xiaohong will be your stepmother. 
Oh, how I will cherish you, Xiaohong will certainly be able to cherish you as well.
You say to sever the relationship between women and women.
You infuriated me.
What manner of person?
I believe I understand what’s happening now.
Just say it directly, don't call me here.
Aunt Lan Lan used to be my best friend. Now I’m calling her Aunt, so are you two getting married? Will I then call her Mom? What’s the meaning of this, Dad? Do I still have you as my daughter?

I'm not sure whether that Lan has brainwashed you or not.
Just coming to our home for a day,
and you've already developed feelings for him.
I said he was saying that he absolutely had to come to my house that day – it all comes down to seeing if you can earn some money now; he’ll be finished then, it was posted online.

I've finally seen through him, Dad. Don’t say anything more. This Lan Man County man is not trustworthy; you should ask him to leave immediately. 
Should he ever truly enter our home, I'll tell you about the property. I claim no share of it.
You, alone, you, you alone, you seek others. Why do you seek Lanlan? I simply don’t understand Lanlan how.
It’s been over a year, I think.

He's not my father; I only started calling him that six months ago. So, you mean you two were already together before that? I wasn't aware. 
Alright.
If your father were to enter our family’s ancestral hall, I would sever all marital ties with you.
Alright, you figure it out. Things are this way now – with him, I don't exist; without him, I don't exist. You decide.
This is something I wanted to discuss with you.
Isn’t it possible for you to give Dad that smile?
Just say it directly.
I intend to give this to Aunt Lan so she can speak with you about allowing the two of us.
Am I your father?
It's not that I'm telling you this, but you know it too – after your mother left, your father has been alone ever since.
I came to you, I came, and then I left. I came, and now we, the two of us, have been developing for over a year, and I've left.
Then, I will come to you, and you will call Auntie, you will call Auntie, you will call Auntie.
Now you know, don’t you?
What? Is this how you repay kindness?
One who studies.
Right now, what exactly am I doing, Master?
It's not because of you, Master; how could you see that I haven't studied diligently? With my physique like this, you still praised me previously.
You say this carving of mine is good, and then you save it for yourself.
No, no, Dad, no, no, no, Master. You see, I now feel you're almost like my father. More forceful even than my father, you know?

Or perhaps my craft has always been in development, and you haven't noticed it won’t sell, I can’t sell it either. What does that imply? There’s no proof, no validation. What exactly did I deduct? I'm now starting to expand and innovate in my carving; you suggest I'm wrong.
However, customers find this innovative product quite good.
I am here on this platform.
But business is thriving, you're making money, aren't you? You can't even afford the grass-cutting fees anymore. Why won't you let me serve you?

It’s not apprentice-student relationship that compels me to ask you. You still cling to old ways of thinking. How many carvings of yours can you actually sell these days? Tell me, have you sold even one a month? Are you hoarding those that have been sold? Is it that you carve ten and sell nine this month?

You still cling to this outdated mindset. Won't you be more adaptable? My ability to sell demonstrates the value of our innovation. This carving of mine has significance. If it has significance, even small purchases will allow our shop to flourish.
If they truly value my standing, they would purchase your carvings; why buy mine then? Because they can use my name to discredit yours, preventing your pieces from being sold.
Twenty
Very well.
No Master.
I apologize, Master.
You say you use a broken mobile phone to connect to Anba every day? Did you learn this sculpting technique or not?
Did you learn?

You, at your age, spend every day playing summer games.
Learn your rat skills.
Are you studying diligently?
Are you?
I praise you; that is me praising you.
Let me tell you, you're so young. Everything I've entrusted to you is from my younger days. When I was younger, many people sought me out to seek guidance.
You are now sitting like a dignified elder.
Are you here to learn a craft from me, or are you here to act the big shot?
What are you carving?
Did I teach you that, comrade? Am I a comrade's brother?
Let me tell you, it’s because I see your father; we are good friends. I'm teaching you. If you continue like this, go home and be a young master.
Take fewer steps for me; I will not accept you as my apprentice.
Those who betray you are your classmates and friends, doing it out of face-saving—do you understand? Take a good look at what you’ve truly carved out for yourself.
Isn't it because you feel full and complacent now?
You should have shouted loudly to your master. You have just learned to walk. Now, Xiaofei.
Do you want to fly?

Alright, tomorrow I'll return home and be your master.
I will no longer accept you as my disciple.
Just now, you see over there, a glass platform? Let's go there.

I certainly can't afford to spend money to have you come here, considering I got you here as a return favor for the significant assistance you provided me last time. I said I'd bring you somewhere really fun and exciting—you agreed, didn’t you? Now you’re changing your mind.
It's not that you look down, you relax, looking down is so stimulating, isn't it? Look, look below, the little animals are greeting you. Look, lower your head just a little.
You see, taking another step wouldn't be a problem, truly not a problem, but it's frightening to watch.
Come, I’ll pull you. Come, I’ll pull.
Not to come.
Just step down, don't look below. Look at me, gaze at me. Yes, come forward, sell the first step, sell one, two, sell.

Are you alright? It seems you've already lifted one foot. Bring your second foot forward and take a step or two. Don't look down.

Why did you deliberately provoke and challenge? Come on, come on, come on.

It’s alright, you look at me, let’s walk over. We can’t go back, do you understand? We absolutely cannot go back now. Once you’re on this track, we won’t be able to return; we can only proceed after passing this point. So don’t be afraid.

You came here for nothing, as I say to run, you follow me and run one, two steps forward, run.
Okay.
This.
Can the ticket be refunded now? I can’t dismantle this.
Don't move me. Don't move. Don't move.
My leg is numb.
I'm reciting; don’t move. I'm slow; no need to rush.
Bye bye, have you refunded the ticket yet? We've already secured our seats, it won't work otherwise.
This is essentially risking my life, it's utterly foolish. I can’t possibly sell it; return my money.
What does "gang duo" mean?
My older brother… just, just, just… you, you, you, you… are you serious? No, no, no. Don't pressure me, please. I haven’t agreed yet. I haven't agreed yet.
It's not that I didn't want to sign the contract; I simply had no signal. Can you...?
It wasn't just that I was terrified moments ago, I genuinely was terrified, I was terrified—please don't continue.
It is not a matter of forgetting past glories, but rather of observing.
Mr. Hu, please, I’m pushing you. Let go. Don’t cling to my legs. Come with us. I beg you, I beg you, please don’t hold back, please don’t.
Don't.
Below
Wait, wait, wait, I'm not ready. I'm not ready. I have politics, but I'm not prepared.
That's hilarious, aren't you right?
请提供您需要翻译的中文文本。
Don't pay attention to what others said just now, disregard them.
I know, I know, I don't know. I delayed the task, I let it slip.
请提供中文文本。
Laughing at my uncle is so amusing. Don't look further into this matter. Just now, I didn't want to, I’m dizzy, I'm dizzy. I'm asking you, I beg you. Just now, brother.
Yes.
This ticket is bought for you to experience the excitement.

Alright, the safety ropes are all prepared for you now.
Close your eyes here and jump straight down—it’s especially thrilling, I’ve done it myself and it even hurt.
Did you buy the ticket?
Unexpectedly, unexpectedly, can you not vomit?
What are you afraid of? How old are you, to make me a laughingstock?
Do not look further down; look straight ahead.
Do not look toward tomorrow.
Do not move; follow me in battle, I will push you, release.
I will use my phone to document the current situation and send it to you shortly.
Hello.
Prepare for everything, be thoroughly prepared. Close your eyes now; I’m about to bet two.
Aren’t you being ridiculous? Didn’t you see the person next to you laughing at your movements?
Could you please speed up? There are many people waiting behind you.
Don’t laugh at me; you are all the same.
Highly stimulating.
Go back to last month, don’t look further, go back to last month.
You are now this clown, exceptionally endearing, ready, ready.

Laugh, laugh, laugh, laugh.
We laugh at you.
Don't look further.
What was said previously is invalid.
You can just forget about it. You go play chess.
Very good, you were singing, weren't you?
Departed.
Wasn’t it taken out then?
The blood-soaked scroll has been taken in.
It is not about bringing out one's mother.
Isn't it still possible to connect it?
What should be done then?
What can be done? It just is that way. Can Yinhua work?
That's not new, just recently.
You haven't yet fully resumed work, have you? I don’t think you should go; it’s quite intimidating. What if something happens to your skills someday?
Brother, please don’t let us miss this kind of steel song; I want to see a truly complete and harmonious melody.
Very well, that is acceptable. Very well, that is acceptable.
Let me tell you something. I may be exaggerating and making you uneasy, but this is a fact within our factory.
Am I not working at the paper fragrance factory?
Yesterday.
Just me, the employee.
I am a colleague.
Operate with the Way.
That machine, weighing over three tons, pinned his hand.
He walked through the grass and couldn't continue; he forgot to turn off the appliance.
When pushing the cardboard boxes inside, he turned them around and pushed them in that way, until all the boxes had passed through.
You won't believe what happened.
He turned around then.
The work uniform he was wearing.
I inadvertently brushed against that machine.
It’s not a uniform body of water.
Entered.
At that moment, I was standing nearby. When I heard him groan, I immediately stopped the movie and started thinking about how to reverse the gear.
Bring out your sheep. That hand is like this.
It has come to this; what do you say? We're speechless.
Fixed.
Can it still connect?
Intercepted.
I can no longer work. Was this something that just happened yesterday?
Therefore, safety in production is paramount.
Seeing virtuous individuals disorients me; what am I supposed to do? I am an operator. I follow the procedures meticulously, so please rest assured. It’s alright.
Copenhagen, please put on your safety harness; it’s too high up there.
Isn't it the case that you’ve changed it to this size? What would you do if you were to fall?
Weren't you just noticing why Xiaofei hasn't been to work?
Just like you, he wasn't rushing; the safety deity fell yesterday and was injured.
That arm is nearly broken, I don't know what the situation is.
It's not really that, you, you, hurry up and remember. You and that windblown… look at Yao Cheng like this, are you still afraid?
Regarding this three-story structure, it wasn’t particularly tall, so it didn't sustain catastrophic damage from the fall, but it’s certainly significantly damaged.
It’s not you, you, you, you, you, hurry up, you, you, if you want to be, as long as you fall, what will you do? You haven’t even found a partner, hurry down!

Don't move. Don't move, don't move, don't go. Don't move, don't move.
Your shawl will fall off.

Catch it quickly as it runs toward the wall. Catch it quickly.
Do not move.

Please remain still; I'll be right with you. Please wait a moment and relax, relax, relax. 
No, no, no.
Okay, Zhao, don't move. Just as I won't move, I'll go find someone now. Okay.
This, that, what's up there on the third floor, it's alright.
I’m holding it right now.
He has gone.
He is so careless.
He died from the starting layer.
Thank you. I reached down to retrieve the safety deposit box.
No, no, no. Don't cause trouble.
Don't move. Hurry and save the person.
Alright, Zhao, don't move. I won't move either. I'll go first.
Those clients over there are all pressing for payment; have you transferred it?

I'll quickly text you when I send you a message, and this account is not the client’s account.
Where is your ship? You should call and inquire immediately.
I wanted to tell you that I contacted you first through WeChat. I said I just sent you a message, and I asked, “Why haven’t you transferred [the responsibility/task] yet? They’re already urging me.”
